set.name: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings MAX Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may search your deck and put a light or water evolution creature from among it that costs the same as or less than the number of your tamaseeds. If you do, shuffle your deck. ■ Whenever one of your evolution creatures attacks, you may draw a card and shieldify the top card of your deck. This ability can only be used once each turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings MAX Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Each player puts the rest of their creatures into their owner's mana zone. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature, if your opponent put 2 or more other creatures that turn, your opponent puts that creature into their mana zone instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings MAX Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a tamaseed and this creature is in your shield zone, it gets "shield trigger". {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or darkness creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creature. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings MAX Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this tamaseed evolves, the evolved creature can't be blocked until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings MAX Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your evolution creatures attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.
